text: Timotheos Christofi (Greek: Τιμόθεος Χριστοφή; born 1987) is a Cypriot football referee who is a listed international referee since 2018.https://resources.fifa.com/image/upload/2020-fifa-list-of-international- match-officials.pdf?cloudid=bdhkmbhyt2evwe69isju He officiates for Europa League Games and for Cyprus First Division. On 31 October 2018 he officiated the biggest derby in Cypriot football, APOEL vs Omonia Nicosia, for the first time. == References == Category:Living people Category:1987 births Category:Cypriot football referees
title: Timotheos Christofi
